com.centimia.orm.jaqu.util
Class StatementLogger

java.lang.Object
  com.centimia.orm.jaqu.util.StatementLogger

public class StatementLogger
extends java.lang.Object

Utility class to optionally log generated statements to an output stream.
Default output stream is System.out.
Statement logging is disabled by default.

This class also tracks the counts for generated statements by major type.
